text:
Best mexican food you'll find in Las Vegas!
Great customer service the ladies there are very nice and friendly and the food is Amazing!!! Try the quesadillas those seem to be their specialty!

I ordered a huarache, it was 10$! Huge, can feed 2 people or even 3. Had to wait for about 20 minutes or so, since they made it from scratch. It was good, it just didn't look the the one from the picture lol The huaraches usually have long piece of meat on top. 
They also put salsa all over and I thought the meat was too salty for my taste.
The huaraches are huge and tasty the consome loco is not to dead thing its just so simple  i expect something different but i guess.. ill recommend the huaraches de asada
